## ConcatKdf.deriveKey() method

Derives a key of a specified length from the input parameters.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static deriveKey(options: {
        keyDataLen: number;
        otherInfo: ConcatKdfOtherInfo;
        sharedSecret: Uint8Array;
    }): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { keyDataLen: number; otherInfo: [ConcatKdfOtherInfo](./crypto.concatkdfotherinfo.md)<!-- -->; sharedSecret: Uint8Array; } | Input parameters for key derivation. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;

The derived key as a Uint8Array.

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->NotSupportedError<!-- -->} If the keyDataLen would require multiple rounds.
